name: Wan 2.1 Image-to-Video
description: Animate a still image into video using Wan 2.1 I2V. Takes a source image and a motion prompt to create a video clip. Essential for cinema: generate a still frame, refine it, then animate it into a shot.

defaults.negative_prompt: static, blurry, low quality, watermark, text

tips: Cinema workflow: generate still with SDXL -> refine -> animate with I2V
The source image sets the first frame; the prompt guides the motion
Use descriptive motion prompts: 'camera slowly pans left, wind blowing hair'
720p model needs ~30GB VRAM (use Comfy Cloud for this)
